description:
Generates ViewBase classes for UWP/Uno projects.

releaseNotes:
‚≠ê Last 10 features:
Added ViewBaseGenerator_IsAbstract setting.
Added ViewBaseGenerator_AddViewModelDependencyProperty setting.
Added ConstructorGenerator.InheritFromViewBase.
Lowered dotnet version requirements to run the generator.
Added auto-detection BaseClass by platform.
Added ability to setup ViewModel in constructor generators.
Added ViewBaseGenerator_CreateReactiveUIWhenActivated.
Changed hint names.
To ConventionalCommitsGitInfo.
Updated to latest H.Generators.Extensions.

Fixed ViewBaseGenerator explicit type bug.

Fixed base class bug.
Added global prefix to viewBase.BaseClass.
Fixed PropertyMetadata bug.
Added GenerateViewBase setting.
Fixed constructor generation.
